result.markdown:
---
title: "Eurovision Song Contest"
description: |
  Analysis of Eurovision from TidyTuesday
author: Phu Vo
date: September 23, 2025
format: html
---





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#| include: true

# Average points by country across Eurovision history.
avg_points <- euro |>
  group_by(artist_country) |>
  summarise(mean_points = mean(total_points, na.rm = TRUE),
            n = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(mean_points)) |>
  slice_head(n = 10)

ggplot(avg_points, aes(x = reorder(artist_country, mean_points), 
                       y = mean_points)) +
  geom_col(fill = "cornflowerblue") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Top 10 Countries by Average Eurovision Points",
       x = "Country", y = "Average Points") +
  theme_bw()
```
